word_means: value的第三人称单数和复数

means: value的第三人称单数和复数

tr: beliefs of a person or social group in which they have an emotional investment (either for or against something)

value.def: The value of something such as a quality, attitude, or method is its importance or usefulness. If you place a particular value on something, that is the importance or usefulness you think it has.

example.ex: The value of this work experience should not be underestimated...
example.tran: 这种工作经验的重要性不应该被低估。

example.ex: Further studies will be needed to see if these therapies have any value...
example.tran: 这些治疗是否有效需要进行进一步的研究。

example.ex: Ronnie put a high value on his appearance.
example.tran: 龙尼非常注重自己的外表。

defx.def: If something is of value, it is useful or important. If it is of no value, it has no usefulness or importance.
defx.tran: 有用的/无用的;重要的/不重要的

example.ex: This weekend course will be of value to everyone interested in the Pilgrim Route...
example.tran: 这一周末课程对每一个对朝圣路线感兴趣的人来说都会很有用。

example.ex: Current sales figures tell us something of value about what is really going on.
example.tran: 最近的销售数据能够告诉我们一些有关真实行情的重要信息。

value.def: If you value something or someone, you think that they are important and you appreciate them.

example.ex: I've done business with Mr Weston before. I value the work he gives me...
example.tran: 我以前和韦斯顿先生有过业务往来，我很重视他给我的业务。

example.ex: If you value your health then you'll start being a little kinder to yourself.
example.tran: 如果你重视自己的健康，你就要开始对自己好一点。

example.ex: As you are a valued customer, I am writing to you to explain the situation...
example.tran: 您是一位我们很重视的客户，所以我写信向您解释一下情况。

example.ex: Why were spices so highly valued in late 15th-century Europe?
example.tran: 为什么香料在15世纪末期的欧洲如此贵重？

value.def: The value of something is how much money it is worth.

example.ex: The value of his investment has risen by more than $50,000...
example.tran: 他投入的资本已经增值了5万多美元。

example.ex: The company's market value rose to $5.5 billion...
example.tran: 该公司的市值涨到了55亿美元。

example.ex: The country's currency went down in value by 3.5 per cent...
example.tran: 这个国家的货币贬值了3.5%。

example.ex: That cup is priceless. You can't put a value on it.
example.tran: 那个杯子价值连城，无法定价。

defx.def: If something is of value, it is worth a lot of money. If it is of no value, it is worth very little money.

example.ex: ...a brooch which is really of no value...
example.tran: 一枚根本不值钱的胸针

example.ex: It might contain something of value.
example.tran: 它里面也许还有什么值钱的东西。

value.def: When experts value something, they decide how much money it is worth.

example.ex: Your lender will then send their own surveyor to value the property...
example.tran: 然后贷款方会派他们自己的评估员来对房产进行估价。

example.ex: I asked him if he would have my jewellery valued for insurance purposes...
example.tran: 我问他能否给我的珠宝进行保险估价。

example.ex: Spanish police have seized cocaine valued at around $53 million.
example.tran: 西班牙警方查获了一批价值约5,300万美元的可卡因。

value.def: You use value in certain expressions to say whether something is worth the money that it costs. For example, if something is or gives good value, it is worth the money that it costs.

example.ex: The restaurant is informal, stylish and extremely good value...
example.tran: 这家餐厅氛围轻松，装修雅致，而且价格非常公道。

example.ex: Both offer excellent value at around £90 for a double room...
example.tran: 两家的双人客房都报出了大约90英镑的超值价格。

example.ex: This wine highlights the quality and value for money of South African wines.
example.tran: 这种酒突出显示了南非产葡萄酒优异的性价比。

value.def: The values of a person or group are the moral principles and beliefs that they think are important.

example.ex: The countries of South Asia also share many common values...
example.tran: 南亚各国也有许多相同的价值观。

example.ex: The Health Secretary called for a return to traditional family values.
example.tran: 卫生部部长呼吁传统家庭价值观的回归。

example.ex: ...young Muslims who feel little sympathy for the values of their adopted country.
example.tran: 与所移居国家的价值观格格不入的年轻穆斯林们

gramarinfo.label: with supp, oft with poss, supp N

value.def: Value is used after another noun when mentioning an important or noticeable feature about something.

example.ex: The script has lost all of its shock value over the intervening 24 years...
example.tran: 时隔24年后，这个剧本已经完全失去了震撼力。

example.ex: Having a mid-morning party certainly adds novelty value.
example.tran: 在上午10点左右开派对一定会增加新鲜感。

value.tran: 重要特点，显著特点（用于其他名词后）

value.def: A value is a particular number or quantity that can replace a symbol such as 'x' or 'y' in a mathematical expression.

trans: 家庭价值观；家庭价值巡演；家庭观；家庭的评价；家庭观念
可能值；可能取值；许可值
三色激励值；三色值；三刺激值；标准观察者的三基色刺激值；三激值
